basic_information.scholarship_name: Paul B. Southerland Outstanding Promise in Visual Arts Endowed Scholarship

description: The recipient(s) of the Paul B. Southerland Outstanding Promise in Visual Arts Endowed Scholarship will be selected by a committee appointed by members of the Oklahoma Journalism Hall of Fame and administered by the director and/or the executive committee. The recipient(s) will be selected in the spring for distribution the following fall and spring semesters. Criteria shall be: Undergraduate student Must be enrolled full-time Must be a Junior or Senior Must be a Professional Media or Photographic Arts major Preference will be given to students who wish to pursue a career as a news photographer or reporter

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
